name: Piranha Pandemonium
description:
Piranha Pandemonium 

A/D - Left/Right

W - Jump

S - Hide (hold)

Space - Place mushroom (bait)

Right Click - Attack 

Sound From https://themushroomkingdom.net/

Music Made with https://www.beepbox.co/

Submitted to Bored Pixels Jam 8  https://itch.io/jam/bored-pixels-jam-8

Made by Nick Berezny
